skills.skill: Integration of Circuits into Power Products

duties_responsibilities.duty: Define and design power IC products for the enterprise power business unit, including analog front end (AFE) signal processing circuits interfacing with large digital content.

Determine AFE signal processing circuit requirements to meet overall system requirements and perform transistor level schematic design and simulations of power, analog, digital, and mixed-signal circuit blocks.
Collaborate with the layout team to ensure proper execution of power IC products and work with validation, test, and qualification teams to ensure readiness for high volume manufacturing.

Provide detailed technical documentation with specifications, block diagrams, and requirements to stakeholders, and collaborate closely with different departments/stakeholders including Test/Validation/Application Engineering, and Reliability/Qualification/Operations to resolve design, application, or test issues.

education_certification.credential: MS or Ph.D. degree in Electrical Engineering or equivalent with 5+ years of experience in Analog/Mixed-Signal IC design
